text: are we we hear from his spokesman that
Richard Hammond was involved in a
serious crash after completing a climb
in Switzerland in a Rimac concept one
electric super super car and you can see
there what happened clearly the car
overturned and there was a very serious
crash that involved a vehicle bursting
into flames well the statement goes on
that Richard Hammond was conscious and
talking actually climbed out of the car
himself he's been taken to hospital by
air ambulance and has apparently had a
fracture to his knee so clearly a very
nasty accident there but Richard Hammond
the former top gear presenter who now
works on the Grand Tour is unharmed
relatively and is now in hospital
